meanings.definition: To increase in scope or range
meanings.sent1: Reading different genres can broaden your knowledge and interests.
meanings.sent2: The company plans to broaden its market by expanding overseas.
meanings.sent3: The joke about the expanding balloon really helped broaden the mood at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her love for travel seemed to broaden her horizons, making her appreciate different cultures.
meanings.sent5: Learning a new language can truly broaden your communication abilities.
